statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_payment_method FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_payment_method, currency_code FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_preferences = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, currency_code FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode_enabled = FALSE ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, notification_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode_enabled = TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, preferred_payment_method, currency_code FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, preferred_payment_method, currency_code FROM user_preferences WHERE currency_code = 'USD' AND notification_preferences = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, preferred_payment_method, currency_code FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_payment_method, currency_code, notification_preferences, dark_mode_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode_enabled = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = true;
SELECT user_id, notifications FROM user_preferences WHERE notifications = false;
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, card_number, expiry_date FROM payment_methods WHERE card_number LIKE '41%';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, dark_mode FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT notifications FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, card_number, expiry_date FROM payment_methods WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY card_number;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode, notifications FROM user_preferences INNER JOIN payment_methods ON user_preferences.user_id = payment_methods.user_id;
SELECT user_id, payment_method, subscription_status FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, message FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE amount > 100 GROUP BY payment_date HAVING COUNT(payment_date) > 2;
SELECT user_id, subscription_status FROM user_preferences WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM users_preferences;
SELECT user_id, payment_method, preferred_currency FROM users_preferences WHERE notification_preference = true;
SELECT method_name, additional_info FROM payment_methods ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT currency_code, currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.0;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE is_read = false ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, payment_method, preferred_currency FROM users_preferences WHERE preferred_currency = 'USD';
SELECT user_id, payment_method, notification_preference FROM users_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT method_name, additional_info FROM payment_methods WHERE method_id > 5 ORDER BY method_id ASC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT user_id, payment_method_preference FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT notification_type, notification_content FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT method_name, method_type FROM payment_methods WHERE method_type = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY method_name DESC
SELECT currency_code, currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 12345
SELECT user_id, notification_preferences FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, currency_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE payment_method_preference = 'Credit Card'
SELECT pm.method_name, ph.amount FROM payment_methods pm JOIN payment_history ph ON pm.payment_method_id = ph.payment_method_id
SELECT u.user_id, c.currency_name FROM user_preferences u JOIN currencies c ON u.currency_preference = c.currency_code
